calm
you
Pirlo English learners welcome to daily
video vocabulary episode 124 in today's
episode I have a new word for you
coerce let's find out what it means and
how you can use it in your daily
conversation coerce at times you do
certain things even though you are not
willing to do them the word coerce
basically means to force somebody to do
something that they are not willing to
do when someone pressurizes you to do
something that you don't want to do they
are coercing you into doing it
you actually compel the other person to
do what you want them to do irrespective
of how they feel about it so when you
coerce somebody you are trying to
dominate them in extreme cases people
use threats to force people to do things
for example you have a piece of valuable
information which you can't let out to
anyone but when someone forces you by
threatening you to give that information
it means they are coercing you the word
coerce is a verb it's past and past
participle form is coerced the word
coercion is a noun the word coercive is
an adjective and the word coercively is
an adverb
okay now that you know what curse means
let's take a look at some example
sentences to see how you can use it in
your daily conversation example 1 Lara
coerced her mother into letting her play
games on her laptop example 2 despite
all the coercion
Saro refused to make up with her husband
after a fight example 3 mark was coerced
into accepting the agreement paper
though he didn't want to example for
when coercing him to surrender his bag
failed the gangsters threatened Bryan
with a knife and gun example 5 Richard
always coerces his friends to quit
smoking example 6 the teacher uses
coercive ways of disciplining her
students example 7 Daniel coerced his
business partner into taking up the new
assignment that would be beneficial for
their company example 8 Ross doesn't eat
his meals on time his mother coercively
spoon feeds him
example nine the doctor coerced her
patient to undergo surgery by showing
him his for x-ray report that's the end
of today's episode has anyone ever
coerced you to do something kindly share
your experiences in the comment box
below this video thank you for watching
us do watch all the episodes of daily

Channel and stay updated with all the

bye and take care
